entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon then light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
